block.p: Kristina Lynn Skeffington, a daughter of Alisanne Skeffington and Edward F. Skeffington Jr. of West Orange, N.J., was married there yesterday to Khalil Yusef Shalabi, a son of Nawal Shalabi of New York and Yusef Khalil Shalabi of Dubai in the United Arab Emirates. The Rev. Victor P. Kennedy performed the ceremony at St. Joseph's Roman Catholic Church.

Mrs. Shalabi, 28, is a marketing manager at Conde Nast Publications in New York. She graduated from Villanova University. Her father is an executive vice president of Revlon, the cosmetics company in New York, and the chief financial officer of its North American unit.

Kristina Lynn Skeffington, a daughter of Alisanne Skeffington and Edward F. Skeffington Jr. of West Orange, N.J., was married there yesterday to Khalil Yusef Shalabi, a son of Nawal Shalabi of New York and Yusef Khalil Shalabi of Dubai in the United Arab Emirates. The Rev. Victor P. Kennedy performed the ceremony at St. Joseph's Roman Catholic Church.

Mrs. Shalabi, 28, is a marketing manager at Conde Nast Publications in New York. She graduated from Villanova University. Her father is an executive vice president of Revlon, the cosmetics company in New York, and the chief financial officer of its North American unit.

Mr. Shalabi, 34, is an operations manager at Consolidated Edison's Indian Point 2 nuclear plant in Buchanan, N.Y. He is also a candidate for an M.B.A. from New York University. He graduated from the University of Notre Dame and received a master's degree in mechanical engineering from Columbia. His mother is a legal assistant in the New York office of Deloitte & Touche, the accounting firm. His father is the general manager of the Gulf Development Corporation, a real-estate development and construction company in Dubai.
